name: Dan Dan Dus
description:
Dan Dan Dus it's a 1 vs 1 online game inspired in rock paper scissors. At the moment Dan Dan Dus it's available only for Android, but it will be for IOS too soon. 

How to play:
The loggic of the game it's simple, as in rock paper scissors you have to choose an action, depending of your choice and your rival's, one of you will win. 

The three actions are:
Recharge:
Be careful, if you recharge while your rival shoots you will die.


Shoot:
Before shooting, you have to recharge. If both shoots it's a tie.


Protect:
Protect yourself if you think the intentions of your rival is shooting, this way he will lose an arrow but you don't.

(If none button is pressed character won't do nothing)



To win:
There is not enough with killing your rival once, every time you kill him you win a position, but if you are killed you will lose it. The first one to arrive at the final point wins.
